name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddComponent
description: Add a GitLab component to an existing list, or add a new list where none was present.
options: [{"name":"newComponent","type":"String","displayName":"Component","description":"Name of the component to use add.","example":"$CI_SERVER_FQDN/components/opentofu/full-pipeline","required":true},{"name":"version","type":"String","displayName":"Version","description":"Version of the component to add.","example":"0.10.0","required":true},{"name":"inputs","type":"List","displayName":"Inputs","description":"The set of inputs to provide","example":"opentofu_version: 1.6.1"},{"name":"insertMode","type":"InsertMode","displayName":"Insert mode","description":"Choose an insertion point when multiple mappings exist. Default is `Last`.","valid":["Before","After","Last"]}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddStages
description: Add or Update the set of stages defined in `.gitlab-ci.yml`.
options: [{"name":"stages","type":"List","displayName":"Stages","description":"Stages to add.","example":"build,test,deploy","required":true},{"name":"acceptTheirs","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Accept theirs","description":"When the set of stages would conflict, prefer the original value."},{"name":"insertMode","type":"InsertMode","displayName":"Insert mode","description":"Choose an insertion point when multiple mappings exist. Default is `Last`.","valid":["Before","After","Last"]}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddTemplate
description: Add a GitLab template to an existing list, or add a new list where none was present.
options: [{"name":"newTemplate","type":"String","displayName":"Template","description":"Name of the template to use instead.","example":"OpenTofu/Base.gitlab-ci.yml","required":true},{"name":"insertMode","type":"InsertMode","displayName":"Insert mode","description":"Choose an insertion point when multiple mappings exist. Default is `Last`.","valid":["Before","After","Last"]}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.ChangeComponent
description: Change a GitLab Component in use.
options: [{"name":"oldComponent","type":"String","displayName":"Old Component","description":"The name of the component to match.","example":"$CI_SERVER_FQDN/components/opentofu/full-pipeline","required":true},{"name":"oldComponentVersion","type":"String","displayName":"Old Component version","description":"Version of the existing component to use match.","example":"0.10.0","required":true},{"name":"newComponent","type":"String","displayName":"New Component","description":"Name of the new component to use instead.","example":"$CI_SERVER_FQDN/components/opentofu/full-pipeline"},{"name":"newComponentVersion","type":"String","displayName":"New Component version","description":"Version of the new component to use instead.","example":"0.10.0","required":true}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.ChangeTemplate
description: Change a GitLab template in use.
options: [{"name":"oldTemplate","type":"String","displayName":"Template","description":"The name of the template to match.","example":"Terraform/Base.gitlab-ci.yml","required":true},{"name":"newTemplate","type":"String","displayName":"Template","description":"Name of the template to use instead.","example":"OpenTofu/Base.gitlab-ci.yml","required":true}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.RemoveTemplate
description: Remove a GitLab template from use.

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.search.FindComponent
description: Find a GitLab Component in use.

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.search.FindTemplate
description: Find a GitLab Template in use.
